cont.entity_a: Bass response is incredible. Bass is deeper than expected.
High frequencies are crisp and clear. Sound is a major upgrade compared to stock iPod buds. Sound quality is better than standard earbuds for the price.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality surpasses cheaper Sony earbuds. Sound is sharp and clear.

cont.entity_a: Earbuds can be turned up to concert volume levels.

Fit.comm: Comfortable fit with different sized ear pieces.

cont.entity_a: Earbuds must be in the ear canal to sound good, requiring clean ears. Three different sized earpieces are included for a good fit. Comfortable for sleeping.
cont.entity_b: Earbuds are very small, requiring careful handling.

cont.entity_a: Short cord for arm band use and a 3ft extension for backpack or pocket use. Cord design is asymmetrical and too short, causing usability issues. Cord length is ideal for arm band use but too short without extension. Cord tangle easily, extension cord is awkwardly long. Cord design causes discomfort due to uneven weight distribution.
cont.entity_b: Cord becomes exposed over time. Wires misshape and become crooked. Cord is microphonic, transmitting sound from movement.

cont.entity_a: Rubber coating on wires breaks down quickly, affecting durability. Durability issues with wire coating over time.
cont.entity_b: Earbuds are fragile with frayed wiring over time.

cont.entity_a: Excellent isolation, blocking out ambient sound.
cont.entity_b: Noise-cancelling attributes are good. Portable noise cancellation without batteries.

Comfort.comm: Comfortable and block ambient noise well.

cont.entity_b: Not suitable for running due to noise from movement.

cont.entity_a: White color doesn't get dirty easily.
Earbuds stay in place during movement, unlike some other brands.
cont.entity_b: Earphones fit well and don't slip out easily.

cont.entity_a: Sound quality is above average, but reliability is an issue.
cont.entity_b: Left channel issues in multiple units, poor customer service.
Good performance for size, blocks outside noise well.
Limited response range, missing some music details. Frequency response has uneven treble range.
